text: "Good Girl" is a song by American country music recording artist Carrie Underwood from her fourth studio album, Blown Away (2012). ==Music video== It premiered on Entertainment Tonight on March 12, 2012. The video debuted at number 20 on CMT's Top 20 Countdown for the week of March 23, 2012. It made history on CMT's Top Twenty Countdown for being at number one for a consecutive 14 weeks. ==References== Category:2012 songs Category:Country rock songs Category:Carrie Underwood songs
title: Good Girl (Carrie Underwood song)
